meanings.definition: A type of boat used for fishing.
meanings.sent1: The fishermen took the garvey out to sea early in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The garvey glided smoothly across the calm waters of the lake.
meanings.sent3: Why did the garvey refuse to catch any fish? Because it was afraid of getting wet!
meanings.sent4: The garvey was a sturdy vessel, weathering the storm with ease.
meanings.sent5: The bright red garvey bobbed up and down, a cheerful sight on the horizon.

meanings.sent1: Mr. Garvey greeted his neighbors with a warm smile.
meanings.sent2: The Garvey family reunion was a joyous occasion.
meanings.sent3: Why did Garvey always win at board games? Because he was a master strategist!
meanings.sent4: The name Garvey echoed through the halls of history.
meanings.sent5: Garvey's legacy lived on through generations, a testament to his influence.

meanings.sent1: For lunch, I ordered a delicious garvey with turkey and cheese.
meanings.sent2: The local deli's specialty was the garvey, packed with fresh ingredients.
meanings.sent3: Why did the garvey break up with the hamburger? Because it couldn't ketchup with its fast food lifestyle!
meanings.sent4: The garvey was a towering masterpiece of bread, meat, and veggies.
meanings.sent5: With each bite, the garvey revealed layers of flavor and texture, a true culinary delight.
